name: Alien Swarm
description: A swarm of aliens from far-away systems controlled by an ancient hive mind. They feast on other species, absorbing their biomass to turn into more of their kind. They have a combination of deadly creatures and swarms of agile aliens to defeat their foes.
author: Solpine#1305

hive_lord.name: Hive Lord
hive_lord.description: A great alien beast, acting as a catalyst for the hive mind.

hive_queen.name: Hive Queen
hive_queen.description: A great alien beast, birthing swarms of aliens when needed.

hive_warrior_prime.name: Hive Warrior Prime
hive_warrior_prime.description: A leader amongst the elite alien warriors.

hive_warrior.name: Hive Warrior
hive_warrior.description: Elite warrior who grows additional limbs when they absorb enough biomass.

hive_warrior_leader.name: Hive Warrior Leader
hive_warrior_leader.description: Elite leader who grows additional limbs when they absorb enough biomass.

soul_stealer.name: Soul Stealer
soul_stealer.description: Mutant that rips apart their foes with unnerving speed.

soul_stealer_leader.name: Soul Stealer Leader
soul_stealer_leader.description: Mutant leader that rips apart their foes with unnerving speed.

hive_swarm.name: Hive Swarm
hive_swarm.description: A swarm of alien insects, weak on their own but dangerous in numbers.

assault_grunt.name: Assault Grunt
assault_grunt.description: The core of an invasion fleet, allowing for rapid attacks.

assault_grunt_leader.name: Assault Grunt Leader
assault_grunt_leader.description: The leader of an invasion fleet, allowing for rapid attacks.

grunt.name: Grunt
grunt.description: The core of an invasion fleet, equipped with a bio-weapon.

grunt_leader.name: Grunt Leader
grunt_leader.description: The leader of an invasion fleet, equipped with a bio-weapon.

burrower.name: Hive Burrower
burrower.description: Large alien beast which burrows underground to surprise their prey.

burrower_leader.name: Hive Burrower Leader
burrower_leader.description: Large alien leader which burrows underground to surprise their prey.

flying_grunt.name: Flying Grunt
flying_grunt.description: Mutated grunt who can fly and spit blinding venom.

flying_grunt_leader.name: Flying Grunt Leader
flying_grunt_leader.description: Mutated leader who can fly and spit blinding venom.

transport_spore.name: Transport Spore
transport_spore.description: A floating spore which can hover across the battlefield or be launched from hive ships for orbital deployment.

consumption_beast.name: Consumption Beast
consumption_beast.description: A monster with huge tentacled jaws meant to rapidly consume biomass.

hive_guardian.name: Hive Guardian
hive_guardian.description: Elite warrior with a thick carapace and a deadly bio-cannon.

hive_guardian_leader.name: Hive Guardian Leader
hive_guardian_leader.description: Elite leader with a thick carapace and a deadly bio-cannon.

hive_stalker.name: Hive Stalker
hive_stalker.description: Working alone, a Hive Stalker hides in the shadows waiting for the moment to strike.

hive_stalker_leader.name: Hive Stalker Leader
hive_stalker_leader.description: Working alone, a Hive Stalker Leader hides in the shadows waiting for the moment to strike.

mind_beast.name: Mind Beast
mind_beast.description: A psychic beast capable of bending reality with its mind and claws.

mind_beast_leader.name: Mind Beast Leader
mind_beast_leader.description: A psychic leader capable of bending reality with its mind and claws.

acidmaw_beast.name: Acidmaw Beast
acidmaw_beast.description: Alien beast which spist highly corrosive acid, melting flesh from bone.

acidmaw_beast_leader.name: Acidmaw Beast Leader
acidmaw_beast_leader.description: Alien leader which spits highly corrosive acid, melting flesh from bone.

mortar_beast.name: Mortar Beast
mortar_beast.description: Big beast with an organic projectile weapon integrated into their body.

mortar_beast_leader.name: Mortar Beast Leader
mortar_beast_leader.description: Big beast with an organic projectile weapon integrated into their body.

hive_lord_guard.name: Hive Lord Guardian
hive_lord_guard.description: Heavily armored bodyguard of Hive Lords.

hive_lord_guard_leader.name: Hive Lord Guardian Leader
hive_lord_guard_leader.description: Heavily armored bodyguard leader of Hive Lords.

spore_beast.name: Sporeback Beast
spore_beast.description: Hulking beast which sometimes emits a thick clouds of spores, hiding other warriors from view.

spore_beast_leader.name: Sporeback Beast Leader
spore_beast_leader.description: Hulking leader which sometimes emits a thick clouds of spores, hiding other warriors from view.

psychic_beast.name: Psychic Beast
psychic_beast.description: When this beast concentrates they are able to alter reality to the hive minds will.

psychic_beast_leader.name: Psychic Beast Leader
psychic_beast_leader.description: When this leader concentrates they are able to alter reality to the hive minds will.

carnivorous_beast.name: Siegebreaker Beast
carnivorous_beast.description: A huge alien beast with a thick carapace, used to destroy enemy fortifications with overwhelming strength.

cannon_beast.name: Cannon Beast
cannon_beast.description: A huge alien beast with an organic cannon.

gunnery_beast.name: Bio-Gunner Beast
gunnery_beast.description: A huge alien beast using a massive organic gun.

gargantuan_creature.name: Gargantuan Monstrosity
gargantuan_creature.description: An alien monster the size of a city-block.

gargantuan_flying_creature.name: Flying Gargantuan Monstrosity
gargantuan_flying_creature.description: A giant alien monster that descends from the skies.

massive_burrower.name: Massive Burrower
massive_burrower.description: A subterranean monstrosity waiting to attack.

toxic_sacks.name: Toxic Sacks
toxic_sacks.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

toxic_sacks_large.name: Toxic Sacks
toxic_sacks_large.description: Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

swarm_melee_tactics.name: Swarm Melee Tactics
swarm_melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

swarm_gun_tactics.name: Swarm Ranged Tactics
swarm_gun_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

spore_cloud.name: Spore Cloud
spore_cloud.description: Once per round, models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at a friendly unit within 6" of this model. This may be used one additional time per round for each model with this rule.

spore_cyst.name: Spore Cyst
spore_cyst.description: Once per round, models suffer -1 Accuracy when shooting at this model's unit. This may be used one additional time per round for each model in the unit with this rule.

legend_born_survivor.name: Born Survivor
legend_born_survivor.description: After taking saves for this unit, roll a d10 for each model or Wound(x) lost.  On a 3 or less, that model or Wound(x) is restored.

birthing_pods.name: Birthing Pods
birthing_pods.description: Once per round after taking Saves for an _Infantry_ unit, roll a D10 for each model or Wound(x) lost. On a 3 or less, that model or Wound(x) is restored. Models must be restored to full Wounds(x) before restoring a new model.

legend_influential_presence.name: Influential Presence
legend_influential_presence.description: Increase the range of all abilities which target friendly units by 6".

legend_adrenaline_pheromones.name: Adrenaline Pheromones
legend_adrenaline_pheromones.description: Friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" add +1" to their Movement characteristic.

legend_stealth_master.name: Master Infiltrator
legend_stealth_master.description: Enemy units suffer -1 Accuracy and -1 Strength when attacking this unit.

hardened_carapace.name: Hardened Carapace
hardened_carapace.description: Until the end of the activation phase, whenever target friendly unit within 18" takes a hit, roll a D10. On a result of 3 or less ignore that hit.

psychic_assault.name: Psychic Assault
psychic_assault.description: Target enemy unit within 24" suffers -1 Accuracy, -1 Strength, and -1 Courage until the end of the activation phase.

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.description:
Target friendly unit within 18" gains one of the following effects until the end of the phase: 
 * The unit may make a free shoot action after it moves 
 * The unit may make a free Charge action after it moves

flesh_hunger.name: Flesh Hunger
flesh_hunger.description: Use when a unit declares a Charge action. That unit gets +3" of Movement for that action.
flesh_hunger.flavor: With a burst of speed, hive units attack like nothing before.

swarm_reflexes.name: Swarm Reflexes
swarm_reflexes.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
swarm_reflexes.flavor: Sometimes manual override by the swarm host is necessary to react efficiently.

hive_mind.name: Hive Mind
hive_mind.description: Use when activating an _Infantry_ or _Monster_ unit. Choose another friendly _Infantry_ or _Monster_ unit within 6" and use its Courage and Initative values for this activation.
hive_mind.flavor: The hive mind controls those who may be unwilling in order to maintain battle order.

hulking_flesh.name: Hulking Flesh
hulking_flesh.description: Use when activating a _Monster_ unit. That unit may remove one critical damage.
hulking_flesh.flavor: The enormous, fleshy bodies of these monsters regenerate at an incredible rate.

monstrous_clash.name: Monstrous Clash
monstrous_clash.flavor: These furious beasts are always ready to swing their massive claws at the foe .
monstrous_clash.description: Use when a _Monster_ unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Counter Attack reaction without testing Initiative.

sweeping_blows.name: Sweeping Blows
sweeping_blows.flavor: The enourmous swings of this beast's claws can cause damage even on misses and backswings.
sweeping_blows.description: Use before a _Monster_ unit uses a fight action, it may re-roll all misses.

swarming_shield.name: Swarming Shield
swarming_shield.flavor: The rolling wave of disposable bodies in the swarm can be directed by the hive mind to sacrifice themselves to protect more valuable aliens.
swarming_shield.description: Use after a _Infantry_ unit has been targeted by a Shooting attack. For this attack, you can roll a D10 each time an attack made with a ranged weapon hits that unit if there is a friendly Grunt, Assault Grunt, or Hive Swarm unit within 6" of it. On an 8 or less a hit is transferred to that unit instead of the original target.

clawing_mass.name: Clawing Mass
clawing_mass.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
clawing_mass.flavor: In a mass of swarming claws, more claws always find a way to enter the fray.

hive_determination.name: Hive Determination
hive_determination.description: Use before activating an _Infantry_ unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
hive_determination.flavor: The hive mind can focus the minds of lesser creatures to defy the horrors of combat.

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
ambush.flavor: Alien Swarms can burrow around to lie in wait for the best moment to strike from surprise.

careful_hunters.name: Careful Hunters
careful_hunters.description: Use before activating a unit in _Ambush Reserves_. After placing the unit on the board, you may move it up to 1d6" in any direction.
careful_hunters.flavor: Elite hunters are able to tunnel accurately and remain undetected in even close proximity to enemies.

leaping_assault.name: Leaping Assault
leaping_assault.flavor: A sudden, explosive leap forward often catches even the most calculating opponent off guard.
leaping_assault.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. If the charging unit only makes a single move action this activation, enemy units may not react to that charge.

born_survivor.name: Born Survivor
born_survivor.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Monster_ model with Born Survivor
born_survivor.flavor: This bio-form was designed to survive blows that would destroy even its fellows.

psychic-eater.name: Psychic Eater
psychic-eater.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Support_ model with Ward(1)
psychic-eater.flavor: This leader has gotten a taste for psychic minds, and has learned how to get close enough to get them.

influential_presence.name: Influential Presence
influential_presence.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Support_ model with Mind Link.
influential_presence.flavor: This leader can exert additional influence on the mass of lesser beings around it.

adrenaline_pheromones.name: Adrenaline Pheromones
adrenaline_pheromones.flavor: This model can exude pheromones that give nearby units a burst of energy.
adrenaline_pheromones.description: Upgrade one _Leader_ or _Monster_ model with Adrenaline Pheromones.

stealth_master.name: Master Infiltrator
stealth_master.description: Upgrade one Leader or Support model with Master Infiltrator.
stealth_master.flavor: This model is a master at hiding and avoiding enemy blows.

chitin_plating.name: Chitin Plating
chitin_plating.flavor: Overlapping chitinous plates can deflect all but the most penetrating weapons.

primal_roar.name: Primal Roar
primal_roar.flavor: Coordinating rampaging beasts can only be done by those mighty enough to earn their respect.
